text.text: Cryolophosaurus, a medium theropod from Antarctica, from the Hanson Formation. A medium preditor, Cryolophosaurus would've feared other Cryolophosaurus and particularly feisty prey. First discovered in 1991, it was described in 1993.
Cryolophosaurus was 6 meters from nose to tail and would've presued anything it could get its jaws arround and would've been covered in feathers to combat the cold.
